enhanced_by.reason: The getOption method relies on options being added to the shortOpts and longOpts maps, which is done by the addOption method.
This method also adds options to the shortOpts and longOpts maps, which are used by the getOption method.
The hasOption method can be used to check if an option exists before calling getOption, ensuring that the option is present.
The getMatchingOptions method can be used to find partial matches before calling getOption, ensuring that the option is correctly identified.
